H0.text: According to several early Old Testament books, who led the Israelites after the death of Moses. Caleb

H1.text: According to several early Old Testament books, who led the Israelites after the death of Moses. Aaron

H2.text: According to several early Old Testament books, who led the Israelites after the death of Moses. Miriam

H3.text: According to several early Old Testament books, who led the Israelites after the death of Moses. يوشع

A4.text: Joshua led the Israelites out of the wilderness into the Promised Land, crossing the Jordan River as if on dry ground, just as Moses led the Israelites out of Egypt through the Red Sea, which they crossed as if on dry land.

A5.text: Joshua served as the mediator of the renewed covenant between Yahweh and Israel at Shechem, just as Moses was the mediator of Yahweh's covenant with the people at Mount Sinai/Mount Horeb.
